title: Snake Game
description: Website designed for computer usage using HTML, CSS, Sass and Javascript ES6.

title: WeatherToday
description: Development of a resposive web application to check the weather using the Accuweather API and local storage. Done with Sass, Bootstrap and Javascript E6.

title: Awesome Profile Cards
description: Code refactoring project from Vanilla JS to ReactJS with legacy code. Development of a web application that generates an online business through an API, and shares resulting card to Twitter. Form validation and local storage.

title: Rick and Morty finder
description: Responsive website using HTML, CSS, Sass and React, with API requests, multiple filtering options, local storage and React-Router.

title: To do list
description: Creation of a responsive web application with HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap and Javascript E6 to add and search for tasks.

title: Stay at home Memory Card
description: Memory card game done during Covid-19 pandemic with cards of activities to do at home. Developed with Vanilla Javascript, HTML5 and CSS.

title: Find your number
description: Development of a game to guess a random number using HTML5, CSS3, Sass and Javascript.

title: Harry Potter Characters
description: Responsive website using HTML5, CSS3, Sass, React and version control with Git to search for your favourite professor of Harry Potter. API requests, filtering and local storage.

title: Tv Shows Database
description: Development of a responsive website with HTML5, CSS3, Sass and Vanilla Javascript to search and save your favourite TV Shows. Api request and local storage.

title: Moving Car Animation
description: Responsive animation made only with HTML and CSS.
